author: Karissa Bell
title: Apple reportedly pulls ads from X amid a growing backlash to antisemitic content on the platform
description:
Another major advertiser is pulling its ads from X amid a growing backlash to antisemitic content on the platform. Axios reports
 that Apple has opted to “pause” all advertising on the platform after its ads were discovered near pro-Nazi posts and X owner El…
